description: Even after switching to English its only other language option, which probably means it’s misspelt American. A lot of main menu options and extras still look more like Qr codes than anything remotely decipherable to any European (americanisation included).
summary: Lots Of Settings Are In Chinese

description:
Even if you choose English as language you get Chinese words around the software (more on dialog boxes). I don't know why Simplified Chinese is the default option.
The UI and the options in the app are quite poor. It could have a potential in the future if more features are added.
summary: Have potential, it's not there yet

description:
Comment utiliser cette application qui est soit en Chinois ou en Anglais.
Traduction en Anglais incomplète, donc on se retrouve avec des parties en chinois et aucune explication.
Déjà rien que le nom de l'application est en chinois ce qui surprend quand on va la chercher dans sa liste des applis installées !

Nul, ne pas l'installer est encore ce qu'il y a de mieux !
